results.name: a(n) = floor( Gamma(n+1/2) ).
reference: M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards Applied Math. Series 55, Tenth Printing, 1972, p. 255.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..450
M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards, Applied Math. Series 55, Tenth Printing, 1972 [alternative scanned copy].
M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards Applied Math. Series 55, Tenth Printing, 1972, p. 255.
formula: a(n)=floor((2n-1)!!/2^n*sqrt(Pi)) where (2n-1)!!=prod(k=1, n, 2*k-1); asymptotically a(n)=n!/sqrt(n)*(1-1/(8n)+1/(128n^2)-5/(1024n^3)+O(1/n^4)) - _Benoit Cloitre_, Apr 29 2003
results.author: _Simon Plouffe_
